body:
Comment 1: 
I'm not sure how to help here.  The go command is targeted first at _users_ of a package
and only secondarily at developers.  It's more important to make it work well for your
myriad users than for your comparatively few developers.  

It is perhaps worth pointing out that you don't have to use go get to download the
source at all.
You can just git clone it into the expected location yourself.
